ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: As for the fixed prices, I m all for it.  I haven t reached the level where I can make banded yet, but when I get there, I want more than a few gold profit for
ygData.messageBody:
As for the fixed prices, I'm all for it. I haven't reached the level where
I can make banded yet, but when I get there, I want more than a few gold
profit for my wares. I do have a further suggestion though. When you see
people selling at a few gold above cost, bargain with them to get their
prices lower, and buy out their stock. Then, sell it yourself at the fixed
price. So long as the person doesn't run fight back to the forge and make
up a new suit of 3gp profit banded, you've got yourself more supply without
the time and effort of making it and without and without the failure costs.

My two cents, free of charge.

Worthing, World of Rodnet Cife
